IYDSStrategy","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"For ProposalType.YieldDistribution pools  Flow: 1. YDS strategy generates yield \u2192 mints donation shares to GDA 2. rebalanceYieldStreams() redeems those shares for underlying 3. Calculates total conviction across proposals 4. Allocates GDA units proportionally to conviction 5. Superfluid GDA streams underlying to beneficiaries continuously  vs Batch Harvest (CVYDSFacet.harvestYDS): - Batch: Manual call \u2192 redeem \u2192 distribute lump sum - Streaming: Periodic rebalance \u2192 update units \u2192 continuous flow","kind":"dev","methods":{"getAvailableYield()":{"returns":{"_0":"uint256 Amount of donation shares in GDA (if YDS mode)"}},"getProjectedUnitAllocation()":{"returns":{"proposalIds":"Array of proposal IDs","shareBps":"Array of share percentages in basis points","units":"Array of units each would receive"}},"rebalanceProposalYieldStream(uint256)":{"details":"Useful for immediate updates after support changes","params":{"proposalId":"Proposal to rebalance"}},"rebalanceYieldStreams()":{"details":"Keeper function - should be called periodically (e.g., every hour)  Process: 1. Redeem accumulated donation shares from YDS strategy 2. Update conviction for all active proposals 3. Calculate total conviction 4. Allocate GDA units proportionally 5. returns._0: uint256 Amount of donation shares in GDA (if YDS mode)

returns.shareBps: Array of share percentages in basis points
returns.units: Array of units each would receive

rebalanceProposalYieldStream(uint256).details: Useful for immediate updates after support changes

rebalanceYieldStreams().details: Keeper function - should be called periodically (e.g., every hour)  Process: 1. Redeem accumulated donation shares from YDS strategy 2. Update conviction for all active proposals 3. Calculate total conviction 4. Allocate GDA units proportionally 5. Start/update/stop streams as needed

arbitrableConfigs(uint256).notice: Mapping of arbitrable config version to ArbitrableConfig

cloneNonce().notice: Nonce for creating unique clone addresses - Slot 108

collateralVault().notice: Collateral vault for storing proposal collateral

currentArbitrableConfigVersion().notice: Current version of arbitrable configuration - Slot 111

cvParams().notice: Conviction Voting parameters (decay, weight, maxRatio, minThresholdPoints)

cvVault().notice: Yield distribution vault used as voting power registry

disputeIdToProposalId(uint256).notice: Mapping of dispute ID to proposal ID

getAvailableYield().notice: Get current yield available for streaming

getProjectedUnitAllocation().notice: Get projected unit allocation for all active proposals

pointConfig().notice: Configuration for point system (e.g., max amount for Capped)

pointSystem().notice: Voting power calculation system (Unlimited, Fixed, Capped, Quadratic) - Slot 119

proposalType().notice: Type of proposals (Funding or Signaling) - Slot 118

proposals(uint256).notice: Mapping of proposal ID to Proposal struct

rebalanceYieldStreams().notice: Rebalance all yield streams based on current conviction

registryCommunity().notice: Reference to the Registry Community contract

streamingEnabled().notice: Whether Superfluid streaming is enabled for this pool

superfluidToken().notice: Superfluid super token address for streaming payments

totalPointsActivated().notice: Total voting power activated in this strategy - Slot 113

totalStaked().notice: Total points staked across all proposals - Slot 112

totalVoterStakePct(address).notice: Mapping of voter address to total staked percentage

voterStakedProposals(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of voter address to array of proposal IDs they've staked on

ydsStrategy().notice: Yield Donating Strategy for Octant-style yield distribution

documentation.text:
@notice Rebalance all yield streams based on current conviction
 @dev Keeper function - should be called periodically (e.g., every hour)
 
 Process:
 1. Redeem accumulated donation shares from YDS strategy
 2. Update conviction for all active proposals
 3. Calculate total conviction
 4. Allocate GDA units proportionally
 5. Start/update/stop streams as needed

@notice Redeem donation shares from YDS strategy
 @dev Converts accumulated donation shares to underlying assets
@notice Stop streams for proposals not in the active list

@notice Get current yield available for streaming
 @return uint256 Amount of donation shares in GDA (if YDS mode)

@title CVStreamingYieldFacet
 @notice Continuous yield distribution via Superfluid (replaces batch harvestYDS)
 @dev For ProposalType.YieldDistribution pools
 
 Flow:
 1. YDS strategy generates yield  mints donation shares to GDA
 2. rebalanceYieldStreams() redeems those shares for underlying
 3. Calculates total conviction across proposals
 4. Allocates GDA units proportionally to conviction
 5. Superfluid GDA streams underlying to beneficiaries continuously
 
 vs Batch Harvest (CVYDSFacet.harvestYDS):
 - Batch: Manual call  redeem  distribute lump sum
 - Streaming: Periodic rebalance  update units  continuous flow
